name: jeopardy-game
description: Multiplayer Jeopardy quiz game with React, TypeScript, and Socket.IO

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev -w apps/server" "npm run dev -w apps/client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/server && npm run build -w apps/client
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit -p apps/client && tsc --noEmit -p apps/server && tsc --noEmit -p packages/shared
